Header: Seven people injured in an accident in Madampe
Content: Seven people were injured in an accident that took place at the old town of Madampe. A Van plying from Kilinochchi to Colombo collided with another Van running from Colombo to Chilaw. The injured people were rushed to the Chilaw general hospital. Meanwhile, the police have arrested four motorcyclists who had not responded to police command. The arrest was made at Watawala. According to the police sources, a policeman has received injuries as a motorcyclist had hit and run. The suspects were produced before the Hatton Magistrate.
